component.name: Surge XT Synthesizer (LV2/VST3)
component.summary: Surge XT synthesizer and effects LV2/VST3

description.p: Surge XT is an Hybrid Synthesizer
Featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
This is the LV2/VST3 plugins version.
